alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 6:12PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Otero, northeastern Las Animas, south central Crowley and southeastern Pueblo Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 612 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Manzanola to near Timpas to 10 miles southeast of Thatcher. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Junta, Rocky Ford, Swink, Manzanola, Delhi, Timpas and Thatcher. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Crowley County; Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft
